title: Free Champion rotation reversed
body: For some reason the new free champion rotation has gone back to what it was last week, its actually less than it was before.

replies.body:
Are these the free champs you're seeing?

https://i.gyazo.com/21c8bc2d4559ce04a3a96b55494e1cf4.png

Nope. The only ones im seeing are gnar and the tentacle lady whos name i cant remember, the rest are all last weeks champs. Heres a link

http://tinypic.com/r/2vi381k/9

Ahhhhh that might actually be because you're a bit lower level. We slightly changed the free champion rotation to include a static group for players level 10 and below. Honestly, I don't know what those champs are off the top of my head, but this is my best guess on what's happening =\
I had the free champs yesterday, when was this implemented

Huh....yea this is pretty weird tbh. Let's try a quick repair through the client options in case something went wrong with some of the files. If nothing seems to help, go ahead and reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

I know for a fact Lux and Jhin are in that group, so this isnt it.
(My feiends started playing recently, they had those cgamps)
Got the same issue. Seeing the exact same champs as Rolonar except I got Darius instead of Gnar.
